price: 130. Haddiise ay kala tagaan, wuxuu Alle ku kaafin mid walba wax ka mid ah Deeqdiisa. Allena waa Waasic (Fadligiisu) ballaaran yahay, Xakiim ah.
arabic: وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغۡنِ ٱللَّهُ كُلّٗا مِّن سَعَتِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yatafarraqā yugh'ni al-lahu kullan min saʿatihi wakāna al-lahu wāsiʿan ḥakīman
